::Aerotaur::
    "Much obliged Grounded."  He grimaced slightly and sprinted out of the 
base.  At the door he concentrated and was on the verge of failure when he 
spotted Deemos.  In a flash of fury he transformed and continued running 
straight at Deemos.  "How dare you attack us again!"  He lashes out with his 
energy-bladed staff.
